metadata.name: Freedom in Ecstasy
metadata.description:
"Freedom in Ecstasy" is an ode to the infinite potential that awakens in us when we break free from the shackles and let true freedom into our lives. This is the moment when our hearts and souls flare up with a bright flame of freedom, taking us beyond the usual, into a world of unknown possibilities.

This picture contains a deep meaning, reflecting our desire for freedom, space flight on the wings of our dreams. It shows that true freedom is not just a release from physical limitations, but also a release from what keeps us inside, from fears, doubts and limiting beliefs.

"Freedom in Ecstasy" is a journey into the deepest core of our being, where we find ourselves in complete harmony with the world, in the arms of absolute freedom and bliss.

Year: 2023
Digital Art
Style: oil on canvas
Size: 3000*3000 pixels, 300 dpi
